content:
by  Joseph KleinschmidtPublished  June  

Each week Trash Film Debauchery hosts screenings of the best of the worst movies PERIOD The kind of cheap thrills youre too shy to admit you love PERIOD So if you couldnt show your face at recent screenings of  or  check out  at the Turf Club June twelfth PERIOD Until then host and founder of the group Theresa Kay picked out ten of her favorite trash films to satiate your guilty viewing pleasure PERIOD Links to choice clips from the movies are embedded PERIOD Note The full  minutes of  are currently on YouTube. theresa Kays Top Ten Trash Films

The Apple

Dead Alive

Hard Ticket to Hawaii

Pieces

The Return of the Living Dead

RikiOh The Story of Ricky

Starcrash

Uninvited

Vampires Kiss

Videodrome
